titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Lordes praier wherein are delivered necessary lessons for all Christians to learne and practise when they will pray: by Fraunces Bunny sometime fellow of Magdalen colledge in Oxforde.
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Francis, 1543-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard by Iohn Barnes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
